ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Constructors of waveband objects for commonly used biological spectral weighting functions (BSWFs) and for different wavebands describing named ranges of wavelengths in the ultraviolet (UV), visible (VIS) and infrared (IR) regions of the electromagnetic spectrum.

Constructors of waveband objects for commonly used biological spectral weighting functions (BSWFs) and for different wavebands describing named ranges of wavelengths in the ultraviolet (UV), visible (VIS) and infrared (IR) regions of the electromagnetic spectrum.

name: r-photobiologywavebands
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.5.4" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-photobiologywavebands
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/photobiologyWavebands_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/photobiologyWavebands/photobiologyWavebands_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: cda1dd3af64670ac78da3d1d5fb8abd59acbea3d91cda343f4e8adf64e2ad97a

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 1
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-photobiology >=0.9.13
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-photobiology >=0.9.13

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('photobiologyWavebands')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('photobiologyWavebands')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://www.r4photobiology.info/, https://bitbucket.org/aphalo/photobiologywavebands
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Constructors of waveband objects for commonly used biological spectral weighting functions (BSWFs) and for different wavebands describing named ranges of wavelengths in the ultraviolet (UV), visible (VIS) and infrared (IR) regions of the electromagnetic spectrum.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
